00017 #include "MisrToolkit.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 
00023 static double round(double val)
00024 {    
00025     return floor(val + 0.5);
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 int main( ) {
00030 
00031   MTKt_status status;       /* For routine calls */
00032   MTKt_status status_code;  /* For error handler */
00033   char *err_msg[] = MTK_ERR_DESC; /* Error message descriptions */
00034 
00035   double lat_dd = 32.2, lon_dd = -114.5;
00036   double lat, lon;
00037   double lat_extent = 200, lon_extent = 100;
00038   double somx, somy;
00039   int path, res;
00040   float line, sample;
00041   int block;
00042   float blk_line, blk_sample;
00043   int l, s;
00044   int latdeg, londeg, latmin, lonmin;
00045   double latsec, lonsec;
00046   MTKt_Region region = MTKT_REGION_INIT;
00047   MTKt_TimeMetaData timemeta = MTKT_TIME_METADATA_INIT;
00048   char datetime[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN];
00049   char filename[200];
00050   char gridname[200];
00051   char fieldname[200];
00052   MTKt_DataBuffer brf_databuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00053   MTKt_MapInfo brf_mapinfo = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00054   MTKt_DataBuffer hdrf_databuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00055   MTKt_MapInfo hdrf_mapinfo = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00056 
00057 
00058   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00059   /* Set a region given center latitude/longitude and an extent */
00060   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00061 
00062   status = MtkSetRegionByLatLonExtent(lat_dd, lon_dd,
00063                       lat_extent, lon_extent, "km", &region);
00064   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00065 
00066   printf("region center lat/lon (dd) = (%f, %f)\n",
00067      region.geo.ctr.lat, region.geo.ctr.lon);
00068   printf("         region extent (m) = (%f, %f)\n",
00069           region.hextent.xlat * 2.0, region.hextent.ylon * 2.0);
00070 
00071   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00072   /* Read data in the region from filename/gridname/fieldname, */
00073   /* do some coordinate conversions, query data buffer and     */
00074   /* get pixel time                                            */
00075   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00076 
00077   //strcpy(filename, getenv("MTKHOME"));
00078   strcpy(filename, "");
00079   strcat(filename, "C:\\Mtk_testdata\\in\\");
00080   strcat(filename, "MISR_AM1_GRP_ELLIPSOID_GM_P037_O029058_AA_F03_0024.hdf");
00081   strcpy(gridname, "RedBand");
00082   strcpy(fieldname, "Red Brf");
00083 
00084   printf("Filename is: %s\n", filename);
00085   status = MtkReadData(filename, gridname, fieldname, region,
00086                &brf_databuf, &brf_mapinfo);
00087   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00088 
00089   status = MtkLatLonToLS(brf_mapinfo, lat_dd, lon_dd, &line, &sample);
00090   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00091 
00092   l = (int)round(line);
00093   s = (int)round(sample);
00094 
00095   status = MtkFileToPath(filename, &path);
00096   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00097 
00098   status = MtkFileGridToResolution(filename, gridname, &res);
00099   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00100 
00101   status = MtkLatLonToBls(path, res, lat_dd, lon_dd,
00102               &block, &blk_line, &blk_sample);
00103   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00104 
00105   status = MtkLSToLatLon(brf_mapinfo, line, sample, &lat, &lon);
00106   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00107 
00108   status = MtkDdToDegMinSec(lat, &latdeg, &latmin, &latsec);
00109   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00110 
00111   status = MtkDdToDegMinSec(lon, &londeg, &lonmin, &lonsec);
00112   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00113 
00114   status = MtkLSToSomXY(brf_mapinfo, line, sample, &somx, &somy);
00115   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00116 
00117   status = MtkTimeMetaRead(filename, &timemeta);
00118   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00119 
00120   status = MtkPixelTime(timemeta, somx, somy, datetime);
00121   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00122 
00123   printf("\n              Reading file = %s\n",filename);
00124   printf("              Reading grid = %s\n",gridname);
00125   printf("             Reading field = %s\n",fieldname);
00126   printf("   number of lines/samples = (%d, %d)\n",
00127      brf_mapinfo.nline, brf_mapinfo.nsample);
00128   printf("        input lat/lon (dd) = (%f, %f)\n", lat_dd, lon_dd);
00129   printf("               line/sample = (%f, %f)\n", line, sample);
00130   printf("             Brf[%d][%d] = %f\n", l, s, brf_databuf.data.f[l][s]), 
00131   printf("         block/line/sample = (%d, %f, %f)\n",
00132      block, blk_line, blk_sample);
00133   printf("              lat/lon (dd) = (%f, %f)\n", lat, lon);
00134   printf("             lat/lon (dms) = (%d:%d:%f, %d:%d:%f)\n",
00135      latdeg, latmin, latsec, londeg, lonmin, lonsec);
00136   printf("                   SOM x/y = (%f, %f)\n", somx, somy);
00137   printf("      pixel time[%d][%d] = %s\n", l, s, datetime);
00138 
00139   MtkDataBufferFree(&brf_databuf);
00140 
00141   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00142   /* Read data in the region from filename/gridname/fieldname  */
00143   /* with extra dimensions, do some coordinate conversions and */
00144   /* query data buffer                                         */
00145   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00146 
00147   //strcpy(filename, getenv("MTKHOME"));
00148   strcpy(filename,"");
00149   strcat(filename, "C:\\Mtk_testdata\\in\\");
00150   strcat(filename, "MISR_AM1_AS_LAND_P037_O029058_F06_0017.hdf");
00151   strcpy(gridname, "SubregParamsLnd");
00152   strcpy(fieldname, "LandHDRF[3][4]");
00153 
00154   status = MtkReadData(filename, gridname, fieldname, region,
00155                &hdrf_databuf, &hdrf_mapinfo);
00156   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00157 
00158   status = MtkLatLonToLS(hdrf_mapinfo, lat_dd, lon_dd, &line, &sample);
00159   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00160 
00161   l = (int)round(line);
00162   s = (int)round(sample);
00163 
00164   status = MtkFileToPath(filename, &path);
00165   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00166 
00167   status = MtkFileGridToResolution(filename, gridname, &res);
00168   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00169 
00170   status = MtkLatLonToBls(path, res, lat_dd, lon_dd,
00171               &block, &blk_line, &blk_sample);
00172   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00173 
00174   status = MtkLSToLatLon(hdrf_mapinfo, line, sample, &lat, &lon);
00175   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00176 
00177   status = MtkDdToDegMinSec(lat, &latdeg, &latmin, &latsec);
00178   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00179 
00180   status = MtkDdToDegMinSec(lon, &londeg, &lonmin, &lonsec);
00181   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00182 
00183   status = MtkLatLonToSomXY(path, lat_dd, lon_dd, &somx, &somy);
00184   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00185 
00186   printf("\n              Reading file = %s\n",filename);
00187   printf("              Reading grid = %s\n",gridname);
00188   printf("             Reading field = %s\n",fieldname);
00189   printf("   number of lines/samples = (%d, %d)\n",
00190      hdrf_mapinfo.nline, hdrf_mapinfo.nsample);
00191   printf("        input lat/lon (dd) = (%f, %f)\n", lat_dd, lon_dd);
00192   printf("               line/sample = (%f, %f)\n", line, sample);
00193   printf("              HDRF[%d][%d] = %f\n", l, s, hdrf_databuf.data.f[l][s]), 
00194   printf("         block/line/sample = (%d, %f, %f)\n",
00195      block, blk_line, blk_sample);
00196   printf("              lat/lon (dd) = (%f, %f)\n", lat, lon);
00197   printf("             lat/lon (dms) = (%d:%d:%f, %d:%d:%f)\n",
00198      latdeg, latmin, latsec, londeg, lonmin, lonsec);
00199   printf("                   SOM x/y = (%f, %f)\n", somx, somy);
00200 
00201   MtkDataBufferFree(&hdrf_databuf);
00202 
00203   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00204  ERROR_HANDLE:
00205   printf("Error: %s\n",err_msg[status_code]);
00206   MtkDataBufferFree(&hdrf_databuf);
00207   return status_code;
00208 }
